greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} phi(d)^(n/d+1).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8299
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} phi(k)^2 * x^k/(1 - phi(k) * x^k).
a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} phi(gcd(k, n))^(n/gcd(k, n) + 1)/phi(n/gcd(k, n)). - _Richard L. Ollerton_, May 07 2021
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, EulerPhi[#]^(n/#+1) &]; Array[a, 50] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Mar 14 2021 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=1, n, eulerphi(n/gcd(k, n))^gcd(k, n));
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 13 2021
